basics.name: Executive Chef
basics.label: Executive Chef
basics.summary: Talented Executive Chef with twenty five years experience developing menus and working as head chef/owner of mobile catering business, fast food Cajun and Classical Seafood/Cajun/Creole Family restaurant. Twenty five years professional experience as a dynamic, resourceful and skilled Executive Head Chef with a proved success record in both fine dining and catering.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for coordination of up to 12 servers in restaurant with a capacity of 200. Baked, roasted, broiled, and steamed meats, fish, vegetables and other foods. Estimated amounts and costs of required supplies. Helped with preparation, set-up, and service for catering events. Developed variety of menu items catering to customers with food allergies and diet restrictions such as gluten-free and vegan items. Managed kitchen operations overseeing 10 cooks and a Sous Chef as part of overall back of the house operations. Managed food and produce receiving process with 100% accuracy. Executed various kitchen stations and assisted with meat, fish, saut� or pantry. Stocked and rotated products. Maintained system of control for storage temperatures and proper functioning of kitchen equipment.
highlights: Responsible for all kitchen operations such as banquet events, buffet lines, room service orders and hotel restaurant.
Adjusted monthly menus to maximize use of seasonal local ingredients and delicacies.
Frequently switched positions as Cold Food prep, Soup Station Chef and Relief Chef mid shift.
Developed popular daily specials with personally sourced ingredients for broiler and sauté stations.
Directed the operation and organization of kitchens and all food-related activities, including the presentation and serving of food
Suggested additional items to customers, as appropriate, to increase restaurant sales

education.area: Culinary Arts Hospitality and Restaurant Management

professionalAffiliations.name: USPCA United States Private Chef Association
